master-lockpicker.name: Master Lockpicker
master-lockpicker.description: Expertise in picking locks and bypassing mechanical security systems.

great-performer.name: Great Performer
great-performer.description: Skill in entertaining through music, acting, or other performance arts.

best-cook.name: Best Cook
best-cook.description: Culinary expertise for preparing meals that can provide bonuses or restore resources.

bartender.name: Bartender
bartender.description: Knowledge of drinks, mixology, and the social art of tending bar.

bandaid-maker.name: Bandaid Maker
bandaid-maker.description: Basic first aid and emergency medical treatment skills.

earthly-diagnoser.name: Earthly Diagnoser
earthly-diagnoser.description: Ability to diagnose mundane illnesses and physical ailments.

cosmic-diagnoser.name: Cosmic Diagnoser
cosmic-diagnoser.description: Ability to diagnose magical maladies and cosmic afflictions.

earthly-historian.name: Earthly Historian
earthly-historian.description: Knowledge of mundane history, cultures, and civilizations.

cosmic-historian.name: Cosmic Historian
cosmic-historian.description: Knowledge of cosmic events, planar history, and celestial phenomena.

lore-master.name: Lore Master
lore-master.description: Deep knowledge of myths, legends, and obscure information.

earthly-botanist.name: Earthly Botanist
earthly-botanist.description: Knowledge of mundane plants, herbs, and their uses.

cosmic-botanist.name: Cosmic Botanist
cosmic-botanist.description: Knowledge of magical and otherworldly flora.

earthly-beast-master.name: Earthly Beast Master
earthly-beast-master.description: Skill in handling, training, and communicating with mundane animals.

cosmic-beast-master.name: Cosmic Beast Master
cosmic-beast-master.description: Skill in handling magical creatures and beings from other realms.

vehicular-variety.name: Vehicular Variety
vehicular-variety.description: Proficiency in operating various vehicles and mounts.

codebreaker.name: Codebreaker
codebreaker.description: Expertise in deciphering codes, ciphers, and encrypted messages.

noblemen.name: Noblemen
noblemen.description: Knowledge of etiquette, heraldry, and navigating high society.

tailor.name: Tailor
tailor.description: Utilize basic materials to repair cloth items.
